answerText: nematocysts [or cnidocysts] [10] Nematocysts are only found in this phylum of animals, which also includes corals and hydras.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Stanford A and Maryland A and University of Illinois at Chicago | 15 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: They are similar to spirocysts and ptychocysts. For 10 points each:   [10] Name these stinging structures found in such animals as jellyfish and sea anemones.
